author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Possible fix for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37018, shamelessly stolen from @AdrianoDee's https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37018#issuecomment-1060086924

#### PR validation:

None, will be done by the jenkins tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: Use externally produced trajectory in ExtenderWithMTD, customise needed TrajectoryInEvent also for PixelLess iteration
